titleStmt.title: Advertisement. Annals, being a large and learned history of church and state affairs in English manuscript, relating especially to England for 800 years ending 1626 ... compiled by Thomas Harding, B.D. late of the University of Oxford. ... If any person be willing to purchase this history, they may see it at the dwelling house of Euclid Speidel in Angel Alley near White-Chappel Church, London, any afternoon, at three of the clock ...

Advertisement. Annals, being a large and learned history of church and state affairs in English manuscript, relating especially to England for 800 years ending 1626 ... compiled by Thomas Harding, B.D. late of the University of Oxford. ... If any person be willing to purchase this history, they may see it at the dwelling house of Euclid Speidel in Angel Alley near White-Chappel Church, London, any afternoon, at three of the clock ...
titleStmt.author: Harding, Thomas, d. 1648, attributed name.
Speidell, Euclid.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An advertisement offering for sale the manuscript of: Harding, Thomas. Annales. Wing attributes the authorship of the advertisement to Harding.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
